name: com.shellter.smooth-pixel-perfect-camera
description: A pixel perfect camera that supports sub-pixel movement

samples.description:
A sample scene to demonstrate the package. REQUIRES Custom-Camera package, Effector-Value package, and DOTween v2
https://github.com/ElliottHood/Custom-Camera 
https://github.com/ElliottHood/Effector-Value 
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/dotween-hotween-v2-27676?srsltid=AfmBOoqyrsiztxHBW_7C0KZ2XvqIJr8TqjsAJDm8VMTizonY6z4oObCg
